Title: The Unbound Slugcat
Description:
"I was never supposed to be here."

[url=https://discord.gg/EmPJh7s2dY]My modding server[/url]. Please consider joining if you enjoy what I make.

A custom slugcat originally uploaded for 1.9.06 and released for it, updated.

He can chain walljumps, double jump by pressing the jump key, and has a semi-variable long jump.
No ending (yet), changes to Iterator dialogue, much of which will be changed in a future update.
Has custom (non-Downpour) Echo dialogue. Maybe you'll be able to piece together what his deal is through them...
Some maps are broken


I am not taking criticism; I made this for fun. Thank you.

This character is a very near and dear OC! Shipping is iffy; I'm okay with him being shipped with Marauder or a canon cat, but please ask before shipping him with any other modcats!
He canonly ends up in a relationship with Oracle (unreleased, belongs to Pix), the red Scavenger (also unreleased / to be added), and a slugcat belonging to Cass / Dustbunniess (not seperately, mind you, it's polyamory). Shipping with those characters is not only allowed but encouraged.

Github: https://github.com/neoncityrain/NCRUnbound

[h1]Credits[/h1]
[b]Ice Fox of Camelot / Pix:[/b] music
[b]Agriocnemis / Ymir:[/b] helping code, keeping me from spontaneously combusting over math, and quality testing dialogue
[b]Pink:[/b] Design, reference, and optional included dress my slugcat skin
Special thanks also goes to [b]Scuglat[/b], who encouraged me to revisit this mod.
